description:
I add two configuration as follows in /etc/nova/nova.conf:

use_syslog = True
syslog_log_facility = LOG_LOCAL1

Rsyslog cannot get the nova logs in local1.*,  BUT Rsyslog can get them in *.*

THis is my rsyslog.conf:

local1.* /var/log/openstack_logs

By the way, I can get the logs in grizzly, cann not get then in havana
title: SET syslog_log_facility = LOG_LOCAL1 in nova.conf, but rsyslog can not get the logs
